overview: Megna hails from a hill station remote village in Tamilnadu, she is uneducated, low in her financial condition, simple, and more beautiful. Once a Thailand photographer visits the place and accidentally meets Megna, he is drowned by her beauty and wanted to make her a big model by taking her to Thailand. Megna agrees to that and she became a big model, In between, she faces an injustice which is very cruel what happens next is the rest of the story.
title: 999 Tamil Movie
